description: This file sets up routing for a Vue.js application using vue-router. It defines two routes: the home route and a lazily loaded about route, and exports the router instance.

methods.name: createRouter
methods.description: Creates and configures a new Vue Router instance with specified history mode and routes.

methods.name: createWebHistory
methods.description: Configures the router to use HTML5 history mode with a base URL.
